channel.title: Vanquish RSPS
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/nM1NEtM.png[/img] The new age is upon us, the future of Runescape private servers is soon to be unveiled and we shall rise amongst the ranks of our competitors, crushing them to claim our title as the number one server. This will be an experience like no other that you have embarked on before, begin your quest to become a legend in our community of players. We invite any patrons to join us in making history and creating a legacy for those to follow. New and Old players will find mutual ground as we accommodate both needs and cater for everything in between.
Time is of the essence, start your journey today…
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/zVpXDvy.png[/img]
Vanquish is the leading Runescape Private Server and is growing daily. With a large active community, plentiful updates, and tons of ingame content we assure you that Vanquish will be an experience of a lifetime! We invite all players to join us in making history and creating a legacy to last in history. The server has been released over a year ago, and has over one thousand active members and we're rapidly growing, which gives us hope that this server will soon become the number one place for Runescape Private Server fans to come and play.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/YDeEsuW.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9eAt7MP.png[/img] [url=http://www.vanquishrsps.com/forums]http://www.vanquishrsps.com/forums[/url] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fC6mT3t.png[/img] [URL=http://www.vanquishrsps.com/forums/server-information/303-play.html]http://www.vanquishrsps.com/forums/server-information/303-play.html[/URL] [IMG]http://runetrack.com/images/skill_icons/overall.gif[/img] [url=http://vanquishrsps.com/wiki/Main_Page]http://vanquishrsps.com/wiki/Main_Page[/url] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4C8HDm0.jpg[/img] Youtube [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0mMZWfo.png[/img] [url=https://www.facebook.com/PRVanquishRSPS]https://www.facebook.com/PRVanquishRSPS[/url] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BUnB1EC.png[/img] Twitter
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jEyknEb.png[/img]
• Updates Daily • Player decided Content • 400+ Players Daily • Hourly Events • Flawless Pking • Flawless Skilling • Flawless Staking • 24/7 Uptime • Active Wilderness • Active Forums & TeamSpeak • Economy Based Server • Weekly Newspapers • Zero Lag • United Nations • Great PvM • Donator Island • Donator Expansion Island • Gano and Nex • Multi/Single Clans • Wildy Hotspots System • Wildy Bounty System • Monthly Competitions • Customizable Client (Resizable, Full Screen etc.) • Notifications (Private Messages) • Settings Interface (Toggle Client Options) • Bloodlust (Details Below) • Voting/Donating/Lottery • Achievements • Custom Items • Mini Games (Barrows, GWD, Fight Pits, Fight Caves etc.)
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/89mG0fa.gif[/img]
[b]Introducing one of the many main attractions, Bloodlust.[/b]
[img]http://i.vanquishrsps.com/bloodlust.gif[/img]
Bloodlust is one of the most successful wilderness games on our server. It separates the weak from the strong and its main goal is to showcase those that perform at an exceeded level in the skill of PKing.
You create a team or join an existing team of elite players and the main objective is to kill rival teams or individual players to collect points for your own team. The game is run in seasons and at the end of each season the top 3 teams will receive generous rewards. With each new seasons scores are reset and everyone is given the chance to be the best and once again, reap the benefits of the rewards at hand.
Rewards for our first season of Bloodlust;
1st Place: $750 and an exclusive Bloodlust Cape 2nd Place: VQ Lucky Bag, Donator points and Bloodlust Cape. 3rd Place: VQ Lucky Bag and Bloodlust Cape.
[size=14pt][u][b]Future Updates[/b][/u][/size]
With our Developers team currently working around the clock to bring the latest updates to the server, what we currently have is only the start of what is to come. An assortment of new updates following up our new client release are currently in motion. Expect to see new updates such as;
Soul Wars Clan Wars Summoning New Clan Chat System Extended Achievements
And of course, many more…
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Kck9us2.png[/img] [spoiler] [size=14pt][u][b]Active Forums[/b][/u][/size] [IMG]http://puu.sh/6SFxc.png[/img][IMG]http://puu.sh/6SFzi.png[/img]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/6SGU4.png[/img]
[size=14pt][u][b]Daily Events[/b][/u][/size] [IMG]http://puu.sh/7kH5E.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/7kH6o.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/7kH6Y.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/7xUly.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/7wlfn.jpg[/img]
[size=14pt][u][b]Active Clan Fights[/b][/u][/size] [IMG]http://puu.sh/7xUvF.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/7xUzc.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/7xUPP.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/7xV73.jpg[/img]
[size=14pt][u][b]Player PK Videos[/b][/u][/size] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7XFadmb0WnU
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iOYE8R4Ra7c
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Pzpmjob4dps
[size=14pt][u][b]Player Decided Updates[/b][/u][/size] [IMG]http://puu.sh/6SJ6w.png[/img]
[size=14pt][u][b]Helpful, Active Staff[/b][/u][/size] [IMG]http://puu.sh/6ZR7e.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/6SMC2.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/6SNWv.png[/img]
[size=14pt][u][b]Miscellaneous Media (New Client Sneak Pics)[/b][/u][/size] [spoiler] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2m41sms.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/90zkvb.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/351c16t.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/21eycfo.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://gyazo.com/d66a43c961861b67e1896241a6ca4c79.png[/img] [IMG]http://gyazo.com/ab80a818c2bc6fda8d158e32a20f2fc8.png[/img] [IMG]http://gyazo.com/b59eb214b00ed40f704949d7f7f1cf8c.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/281xw6a.jpg[/img] [/spoiler] [/spoiler] [/center]
